title: unspecified error has occured (patching / reinstalling)
body: I recently was trying to clean my PC with CCleaner, and i went and deleted all duplicate files on my PC that CCleaner said i should do. Next time i launch into league, after champion select i cannot connect to a game. I keep pressing reconnect, and every time i simply get another bug splat. So i decide to reinstall my game, as im doing so I cannot get the client to patch, i get the message "unspecified error has occured" and then the bar resets. Please help. i can include some logs if you need them. i just want to play the game this weekend D:

replies.body:
Most patching issues are caused by either the client not being run with the proper permissions it requires or if your network settings prevent the patcher from maintaining a solid connection to the patching servers. Our [**patching issues guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202969434-Patching-Issues) goes over the most common solutions, so I recommend working through the steps inside.

Let me know if you encounter further issues after taking those steps.
